channel.title: Dessert on Tiny Tavern
channel.description: Recent content in Dessert on Tiny Tavern

item.title: Affogato
item.description: A scoop of ice cream mixed with a hot shot of coffee. Served with your choice of vanilla or chocolate ice cream.

item.title: Chocolate Milkshake
item.description: Chocolate ice cream, milk, chocolate syrup, whipped cream, sprinkles

item.title: Chocolate Oreo Milkshake
item.description: Chocolate ice cream, milk, Oreo cookies, chocolate syrup, whipped cream, crushed Oreo bits

item.title: Oreo Milkshake
item.description: Vanilla ice cream, milk, Oreo cookies, whipped cream, crushed Oreo bits

item.title: Strawberry Milkshake
item.description: Strawberry ice cream, fresh strawberries, milk, whipped cream
